title: Was Trump First US President To Lose Popular Vote, Get Impeached, Then Lose Reelection?
subtitle: The 45th president made history, both good and bad, in the 2020 election.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Donald Trump was the first U.S. president to be elected while losing the popular vote, to get impeached, and then to fail to be reelected as an incumbent.
